title: Analysis of the Impact of Educational Policy on Urban Educators' Understanding of Instruction

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of education policy and assessment systems, and acquisition of foundational concepts in sociology or education
context.additional_context: Students explore real-world impacts of educational policies through team-based discussions and case analyses, conducting asynchronous learning via LMS in BYOD environments. The final project consists of an in-depth report and presentation analyzing specific policy cases.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the impact of educational accountability policies on teachers' instructional design through discourse analysis
Learners can identify and discuss conflict cases between policy compliance and humanistic educational goals in urban educational settings
Learners can write reports analyzing characteristics of policy classification systems contributing to educational inequality
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
